Original:
如果您不吸煙且有過敏症，那麼這不是一個好酒吧。台北的酒吧只允許在有獨立通風系統的獨立吸煙室吸煙。在這裡，顧客在酒吧抽煙，完全不用擔心周圍的人可能不想在幾個小時內吸入二手煙。
男調酒師不苟言笑，也不友善。女調酒師只是稍微友善一點。我確實很感激他們定期給你倒水。酒吧裡的一些顧客相當友好，但整體氛圍因不斷吸煙和缺乏通風而被破壞。
還有，一杯奧瑪威士忌400元？超市裡不到800就能買一整瓶。
EN:
If you don't smoke and have allergies, then this is not a good bar.The bar in Taipei only allows smoking in independent smoking rooms with independent ventilation systems.Here, customers smoke in the bar, so they don't have to worry about the people around them may not want to inhale second -hand smoke within a few hours.
The male winemaker is unsmiling and not friendly.The feminine wine master is just a little friendly.I am really grateful for them to pour you on a regular basis.Some customers in the bar are quite friendly, but the overall atmosphere is destroyed due to continuous smoking and lack of ventilation.
Also, a cup of Ogin whiskey 400 yuan?You can buy a whole bottle less than 800 in the supermarket.

EN: I came here because I recommended by a Japanese I met in another store, and the cocktail is really delicious. I asked the master a cup of cocktails and told him my taste, so he made a cup with a cup with a cup with a cup with a cup with a cup. The cocktail of passion fruit is.
